title: Join my Discord Community <3
body:
Everyone's organized by what role they main with an elo tag <3 I hope to make teams for those who want to be on them, create scrims, and eventually have RP prizes. If you don't have the app downloaded, just paste this link https://discord.gg/011amLs7jFpnEwmtB into your browser, and it works the same!
Just shoot the owner with a message of your main role/ rank so you can be tagged, thanks <3 {{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}

replies.body:
IGN Ladd3r

Main role ADC / Top
Rank gold
